title: Thanks to Riot
body:
Hello fellow league summoners as well as Riot games. I'm not to savvy on making game reviews or posting youtube videos, but I just want to say as a fan, thanks for all the time and work you guys put into making the game as balanced and fun as possible. As a gamer I usually jump from game to game for the thrills, but Im getting up there in age so I got to make good investments with my time. But I can honestly say I want to stick with League of Legends, the game is simple enough for fun and complex enough for competitive play. If there's a link I could go to to give positive feedback please post it here.
Thanks

replies.body: Thank *you* for playing, and for sticking with it! I know it can be pretty intimidating at first! :3

There is a feedback survey that you can take by following [this link](http://leagueoflegends.na-surveyen2.sgizmo.com/s3/).

A day never passes where I go without hearing an incredible story from this community.  Thanks for sharing, I hope you can enjoy the game for many years to come!

Oh my god. I really have to congratulate you. I never really thought about this before. thanks for bringing this to my attention. Oh, and thanks Riot!
